definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: And he is in prison waiting to be executed. So, he’s gonna be killed; he’s hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 他在监狱里等着行刑，很绝望。

sentences.english: In the Asian version of this execution, the victim would stand upright and the sawing would begin at the top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲版的锯刑中，犯人是站直的，行刑从头部开始。

sentences.english: But… this man who came to the execution , how do you know he used that name?
sentences.chinese: 这个来行刑室的人你怎么知道他的名字？

sentences.english: They told the executioner to let him go, and pardoned him.
sentences.chinese: 就让刽子手停止行刑，赦免了王延寿。

sentences.english: Doda never went with the execution party into the Dune Sea and was spared a fiery death.
sentences.chinese: 多达没有跟行刑队一起去沙丘之海，因此逃过一劫。

sentences.english: After her father-in-law’s “execution,” a young man arrives.
sentences.chinese: 她的公公“行刑”完，家里来了一个年轻男人。

sentences.english: No man in Tabriz trifled with the executioner.
sentences.chinese: 在大不里士没人敢轻视行刑者。

sentences.english: Read the execution narrative in the Gospel of John.
sentences.chinese: 看看约翰福音中是怎么叙述行刑的。

sentences.english: The third chapter: The present situation and shortcomings of imprisonment execution socialization in our country.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，我国监狱行刑社会化制度的构建。

sentences.english: Then three were tied to the pillar for execution .
sentences.chinese: 接着有三个人被捆在刑柱上准备行刑。

sentences.english: Lictors are sacred and were the peacekeepers of the old empire.
sentences.chinese: 行刑吏是神圣的，他们是旧帝国的和平守卫者。

sentences.english: I'm sorry,at the end, right on like maybe Wednesday before he is executed.
sentences.chinese: 什么？，在末尾，就在他行刑之前的那个星期三吧。

sentences.english: He had to be lifted onto the trolley on which he was to die, and then strapped down.
sentences.chinese: 他得被抬到行刑的推车上，然后捆起来。

sentences.english: The torturer would then smash each limb and joint with the heavy, iron-enhanced wheel.
sentences.chinese: 行刑者会用沉重的包铁的轮子碾碎四肢和关节。

sentences.english: When Ciano faced the firing- squad he paid his debts to the full.
sentences.chinese: 当齐亚诺面对行刑队时，他完全偿清了他的债。

sentences.english: You know that they're a death squad.
sentences.chinese: 那你该知道他们是个行刑队。

definition: prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
to behead sb and display the head in public
beating with wooden staves (as corporal punishment)
an execution/to put sb to death
